rows.title: Follow up with Stephanie Phillips - Kiwanis attendee list
rows.description: You requested attendee names and emails after your Kiwanis presentation on Nov 12. Stephanie responded with the President's contact (Hugh Grist at Hugh@gristrealty.com). Follow up to get the full attendee list for relationship building and future engagement opportunities.
rows.actionRequired: Send follow-up email requesting complete attendee list

rows.title: NC Digital Opportunity Gathering - State Partnership Opportunity
rows.description: Mark forwarded an invitation from Adrienne Clark (adrienne.clark@nc.gov) for a Digital Opportunity Gathering pre-meeting in December 2025. This NC state government initiative aligns perfectly with HTI's digital equity mission and could lead to significant state-level partnerships and funding opportunities.
rows.actionRequired: Review agenda PDF and confirm attendance with Mark

rows.title: Insurance review in progress with Carter Helms
rows.description: You sent Carter your insurance documentation on Nov 14 using AI-generated PDF. Carter acknowledged receipt and complimented the AI approach. He will shop for better rates across multiple carriers. Expect follow-up quotes within 1-2 weeks.
rows.actionRequired: Wait for quotes, review when received
